Determine whether variable is skill question

Source: R/fokus.gen.R
is_skill_question_v.Rd

Determines for each variable whether or not it is a skill question.

is_skill_question_v(v_names)

Arguments

v_names

A character vector of FOKUS variable names.

Value

A logical vector of the same length as v_names.

Details

Note that the determination is performed by simply parsing v_names.

See also

Other variable-related functions shorten_v_names(), v_lvls(), v_proposal_nr(), v_skill_question_nr()
